Navong avu keil onomai amual en out volvol, akan manna koa Mosis sani min keil, veni Tus Votut vit,
‘Kei san veret ran out nesa vi ae.’ ”
Sam keil 78:24

Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Naviteni anatin min kami, kei koa san veret ran out nesa vi ae rovitei Mosis. Vi Tata onak koa sani min keil. Ka kei mul sani min kami veret koa vi anatin koa ka en out nesa.
Ven veret koa Ahi mul sani vi kei koa mita netan ran out nesa ka mul san moulien min meatin keil ten out netan.”
Navong alonge mukok, avisi avit, “Asuv, kisan veret enek min komai li lisenges.”
Sakini, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Inau navi veret koa san moulien. Koakeil vasi umai venau, amai herkattei mun keil. Ka koakeil akur anatin enau, maroro herkattei mun keil.
Ka avaseini miles inau ka merikel keil koa namumoni, mirkurtei anatin veah enau.
Koakeil vasi Tata onak rie lat keil avahi meatin keil onak, keil imai usil kat inau. Ka nikur revi koakeil vasi usil kat inau, nirseseintei keil en avong etai.
“Nikur revi keil veni namita ran out nesa keke moumon asa koa kei koa sila inau en vati moumoni. Narmumonteis asa koa inau sasok ek vati.
Ka kei en vati keke malekat revi tounah vasi koa lingi en hek keke tounah tovuol vavuol. Ka en keite ten tounah vasi, meatin vasi keil onak imea ran matien.
Ven Tata onak en vati keke koakeil vasi ales Natnali ka akur anatin eni ikur moulien ten lisenges. Ka, en keite ten tounah vasi, nisakin keil imoul eris ran matien.”
Navong Siu keil alonge keke Iesu vit vi veret koa ka en out nesa, aselus kutut kati avit,

p.span: “Komai mekilea en meatin ekek. Ka mekilea en tata ka mama onen emun. Kei vi Iesu, natin Siosep enges. ?Sakini, hemukave suk kilea vahiteni keke mita ran out nesa?”

body.p: Iesu vit kesi vit, “Kami minasel kututtei mun usil selusien keil onak.
Koakeil enges Tata onak mul sila keil keke avamai venau akilea imai ihi meatin keil onak. Ka inau nisakin keil imoul eris ran matien en keite ten tounah vasi.
Provet keil telamu amutisi avit,
‘Ahi varei hehisein meatin vasi keil.’
Aesea 54:13
Ka koakeil along ren Ahi ka akur hihiseien eni amul umai venau.
Narvitentei keke meatin tai les Tata en meten kati. Inau enges nales Tata onak veni naka veni.
Anatin eli naviteni min kami keke koakeil vasi aling demkatien one enau ikur moulien ten lisenges.
Inau navi veret koa san moulien.
Avu onami keil akan manna en out volvol. Ka avaseini, keil umatmat.
Ka inau navi veret koa mita netan ran out nesa. Ka koakeil akan veret enek asakras avamat.

Anatin, inau navi veret koa san moulien koa mita netan ran out nesa. Meatin koa kan veret enek, kei hemoul lisenges. Veret koa nasani min kami vi avek. Ka namul nasani min meatin keil ten out netan keke akilea avakur moulien.”
Navong Siu keil along selusien onen Iesu amutimanin ka asel min keil eris avit, “?Ei, mukave? ?Meatin ekek hesan aven min komai meheani hemukave?”
Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, munak miherkantei aven Natin Meatin, ka mihermuntei ran, misakras mivakur moulien ten lisenges.
Koakeil akan avek ka amun rak, nisakin keil enges imoul eris ran matien en keite ten tounah vasi.
Veni avek vi anien koa vi anatin, ka rak vi tounah tamunien koa vi anatin.
Koakeil akan avek ka amun rak
akapil vituai ral minau, ka inau nakapil vituai ral min keil.
“Tata onak sila inau numai ka kei vi vatte ten moulien. Inau nakur moulien rani. Sakini, en vati sise enek, koakeil akan inau ikur moulien ranau.
Sakini, avek vi veret koa mita ran out nesa. Ka rosuvaltei veret koa avu onami keil akani, ka katau suk umatmat. Veni meatin koa kan veret ekek hekur moulien ten lisenges.”
Iesu viten selusien keil ekek navong mul vihisei en eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil en taon ten out Kapaniam.
Meatin keil houlu armusiltei mun Iesu veni amundemi avit hihiseien keil onen keih
Navong koakeil amusil Iesu along selusien keil onen, aviteni min keil eris avit, “Ei, hihiseien keil ekek keih varei keke rovakuri. ?Isei varei kilea vakur anatin eni?”
Ka Iesu kilea keke meatin keil onen amul aselus kutut kat hihiseien keil onen enek. Sakini, les keil ka vit, “?Mukave? ?Hihiseien keil ekek mul sakin kami mimutimanin ka mimusavoi en demkatien onami?
Ka mihetimanin ka mihesavoi anatin munak miheles inau, Natin Meatin, nihina ris en out nesa, out koa naka ien mulamu.
Ninin onen Ahi varei mul san moulien min meatin keil. Ka meatin sakras vahotin moulien vaka en keihoen onen sasen. Selusien keil koa nasani min kami aka ven Ninin ka amul asan moulien.

Ka tei en kami arlingtei demkatien one enau.” Iesu viteni mukok veni, en avong koa mum rohtoh en umen onen, kilea tuai isei en keil herlingtei demkatien onen eni, ka isei varei hemaeni heha en hen vativieh keil onen.
Evus, Iesu vit risi vit, “Veni nakilea keke meatin houlu irlingtei demkatien enau, naviteni min kami tuai keke meatin tovuol kilea vamai venau munak Ahi romaentei.”
En avong koanek, meatin keil houlu alokoveini ka armusiltei mun.
Navong Iesu les meatin keil enek amul uva rani, viles les meatin teindan elu (12) onen ka vis keil vit, “?Ka mukave en kami? ?Kami emun mihelokovein inau?”
Ka Saemon Pita vit kesi vit, “?Asuv, munak mehelokoveinuk, meheha ven isei mun? Veni keik kos kokur selusien koa san moulien ten lisenges.
Ka komai meling demkatien onomai enuk ka melei kilea keke keik kovi Mesaea, Meatin Votut onen Ahi.”
Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Inau varei narie lat kami koa mivi teindan elu (12) keke mivousil inau. Ka avaseini, tai en kami vi Temat.”
Iesu mul vit usil Sudas, natin Saemon Eskariot. Veni avaseini Sudas vi tai en meatin teindan elu (12) onen, kei hemaen Iesu heha en hen vativieh keil onen.
Tunali Iesu keil arlingtei demkatien one eni
Katau en koanik, Iesu mual ka mum en out keil en provins ten out Kaleli. Ka en rovattei vaha en provins ten out Sudea, veni kilea keke hetetamen keil onen Siu keil alekat ahho keke avou vini.
Ka navong Ale ten Votevav Keil mai vesesal,
tunali Iesu keil aviteni mini avit, “Konatoteis ekok en provins ten out Kaleli. Hetahos imok kiha en provins ten out Sudea keke koakeil e vati avousiluk akilea avales merikel keil koa komul komumoni.

Kiha ekonek veni meatin koa en vati vamai vahi hetetamen tai en meten meatin keil sakras voum suai. Sakini, munak vi anatin keke kokilea kovoumon merikel keil, kumoni en mesaiuai keke kihothot enuk min meatin keil ten out netan.”
Tunali keil aviteni mukonek veni, avaseini avi tunali kati, keil emun arkurtei anatin eni keke kei vi Mesaea.
Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Avong keke nihothot enau min meatin vasi keil romaitei veah. Ka kami mikilea mivoumon asa koa emi vati en avong vasis.
Meatin keil ten out netan tine rokattei kami. Ka tine mul kat inau veni namul navit leini keke sakien keil one tisaso.
Kami miheha en mari ale ekek. Inau nirvatei mau, veni avong romaltei veah keke maha.”
Navong Iesu selus mukok, kei ro enges en provins ten out Kaleli.
Iesu va en Ale ten Votevav Keil en out Serusalem
Navong tunali Iesu keil uva en ale, Iesu ro nges teim avong vahis emun. Evus, kei mun va, ka mum suai eni ral min meatin keil onen keke meatin sav keil emun areingeingeni.
En out Serusalem, hetetamen keil onen Siu keil amul alekat vis Iesu en vangi meatin keil koa umai ven ale. Keil amul avis meatin keil avit, “?Meatin ekek mul kave?”
Meatin keil koa umai en ale enek aselus lelau houlu usil Iesu. Tei en keil avit, “Kei vi more meatin tai.” Ka tei mun en keil avit, “Vuo, kei mul luvos meatin keil.”
Ka meatin keil arselus leintei usil Iesu veni ametau keke hetetamen keil onen Siu keil analongtei ka anoum nakeih kat keil.
Navong Siu keil amul veah amumon tounah ten ale enek, Iesu mai en out Serusalem, va en teahu ten Eim Votut, ka visein meatin keil ien.
Ka navong hetetamen keil onen Siu keil along hihiseien keil onen, amutimanin eni avit, “?Meatin koanek kur ileilien keil ekek en out kave, veni kei rovatei en sukul keke avahiseini?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Tounah keil koa namul navihisei eni arkatei venau. Aka ven Ahi koa sila nau.
Koakeil e vati avoumon asa koa Ahi en vati, keil ilea keke hihiseien keil onak aka ven Ahi ka arkatei ven inau sasok.
Meatin koa mul san selusien koa ka ven kei sasen enges, kei en vati vahou lat kei sasen enges vahina nesa. Ka meatin koa mul sak visi vahou lat kei koa sila, kei vi anatin ka luvosien tovuol ien.
Kami vasi mikilea keke Mosis san mengkatien keil min kami. Ka tovuol en kami mul long kat vasi mengkatien keil enek. ?Sakini, vensa varei mimul milekat ahho keke mivou vini nau?”
Vangi meatin keil koa araengoni aviteni mini avit, “Vahesa temat tai mul enuk koa viles rendemien onom. ?Isei varei sak visi vou vinik?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Inau namumon merikel tai en Sabat ka mimutimanin eni ka tinomi kat inau veni.
Ka kami emun mimumon umen tai en Sabat navong mimusil mengkatien keil onen Mosis usil vekahoi. Veni kei meng kati vit ehon keil onami iha en vekahoi navong avong one hehi outel (8) kati.

Ka munak avong enek kistal en Sabat, mimumon umen enek ten vekahoi en Sabat keke mirrali kotehtei mengkatien koanek onen Mosis. Ka rovitei Mosis koa mum rohtoh en mengkatien koanek, vati avu onami keil telamu amumon rohtoh eni. Sakini, romaltei keke tinomi kat inau veni nasak revi vasin aven meatin tai en Sabat.
Sakini, minalei rahittei mun meatin keil nousil lesien onen meatin keil. Ka mihelei rahit asa koa meatin tai mumoni housil rendemien koa mal anatin.”
Meatin keil arkilea revitei keke Iesu vi Mesaea vuo isei
Navong tei en meatin keil en out Serusalem ales Iesu mul vihisei avit, “?Rovitei meatin koa hetetamen keil orer e vati avou vini?
!Ka miheles visi! Kei mul selus en out koa vi mesai en meten meatin keil, ka hetetamen keil arviten etai tounah. Vahesa keil akilea vi anatin keke kei vi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati keke hesani hemai.
Ka avit navong Mesaea hemai, meatin hetovuol heilea keke ka kave. Sakini, kei sakras vahi Mesaea veni rokilea keke meatin enek ka kave.”

Navong Iesu vihisei en teahu ten Eim Votut, kei selus va nesa vit, “?Mukave? ?Anatin keke kami mikilea inau ka out kave naka ien? Narmaitei ekok vousil rendemien keil onak. Numai ekok musil rendemien onen Ahi koa sila inau. Kei varei vi anatin, ka kami mireingeingeni.
Inau nakilea eni, veni naka veni ka kei sila inau namita.”
Navong along selusien onen, meatin keil e vati mok avahuli kati. Ka meatin tovuol voumoni veni avong kati onen romaitei veah.

Ka meatin keil houlu akur anatin keke kei vi Mesaea. Veni avit, “Aviteni avit navong Mesaea hemai, kei houmon merikel keil hehi houlu. !Ka meatin tovuol kilea voumon merikel keil vahi houlu imok valin koakeil Iesu mul mumoni!”

Farasi keil along asa koa vangi meatin keil amul aselus lelau eni usil Iesu. Sakini, keil ka asuv keil onen pris keil asila meatin taleikokoeien keil koa alei kokoe en Eim Votut onen Ahi keke avaha avahuli kat Iesu.
Navong meatin taleikokoeien keil amul umai, Iesu viteni vit, “Nito hetal min kami avong hehi havivis. Hevus, niha ris ven kei koa san inau namita.
Kami mihelekat vis inau, ka mihervotintei inau. Mihervotintei inau veni misakras mivaha en out niha nito ien.”

Navong alonge mukok, hetetamen keil aviteni min keil eris avit, “?Meatin enek heha en out kave koa rosakras rovahotini? ?Vahesa heha ven Siu keil koa amul en kantri sav keil, vuo heha hehisein me-Gris keil varei?
?Asa varei aneite ten selusien onen keke rehelekat visi, ka rehervotintei?”
Iesu vit hesan oai ten moulien min meatin keil
En avong ekor ten avong oulu (7) ten ale enek koa vi hetetamen imok mulin avong sav keil teni, Iesu mulomal en teahu ten Eim Votut ka selus vina nesa vit, “Kami koa maroro kat kami mihemai venau.
Meatin koa kur anatin en inau hemai hemuni. Ka asa koa Tus Votut vit usili hekistal hehi anatin koa vit,
‘Nisakin oai koa san moulien hemai heka en tin meatin, ka houe hehi houlu hesuval oaisal tai.’ ”
Aesea 44:3

Navong Iesu viten selusien koanik, vi tatavolien tai usil Ninin Votut. Aneite teni vi koakeil akur anatin keke kei vi Mesaea, Ninin Votut hemai heto en keil. Ka en avong enek, Ninin Votut romaitei veah en meatin keil, veni Iesu rovinatei veah keke vakur hetetamenien onen.
Navong meatin keil along selusien keil ekek onen Iesu, tei en keil avit, “!Meatin ekek vi Provet koa suval Mosis koa Ahi vat kati keke hesani!”
Ka tei keil avit, “Vuo, kei vi Mesaea varei.”
Ka tei mun en keil avit, “Kei sakras vahi Mesaea veni Mesaea sakras vaka en provins ten out Kaleli.
Veni Tus Votut viteni keke Mesaea heka en vatiamal onen asuv houlu Deved, ka ihasi en out Betlehem, taon koa Deved ro ien en avong telamu.”
Sakini, vangi meatin keil enek akur rendemien tateisav keil usil Iesu.
Ka tei keil e vati avahuli kati, ka meatin tovuol vaha voumoni.
Hetetamen keil onen Siu keil arkurtei anatin en Iesu

Meatin taleikokoeien keil ten Eim Votut koa asuv keil onen pris keil ka Farasi keil asila keil keke avaha avahuli kat Iesu along tounah koa Iesu viteni. Evus, uva ris ven avat keil one. Ka navong asuv keil onen pris keil ka Farasi keil alesi keke umai hon enges avit, “?Vensa varei mirvuli kattei Iesu?”
Ka meatin taleikokoeien keil avit kesi avit, “Mirvuli kattei veni selusien onen tahos imok. Hihiseien keil onen rosuvaltei onen meatin sav keil.”
Farasi keil avis keil avit, “?Mukave? ?Meatin enek luvos kami mun?
Tovuol en komai hetetamen keil ka Farasi keil koa vakur anatin eni ka vousili.
Vi meatin kuren keil enges koa arkileatei mengkatien keil onen Mosis keke akur anatin eni. Ka ven koanek, sesendaen mul en moulien one.”
Nikodimas, koa va selus min Iesu tuai, kei ro ekonek ral min keil. Ka navong long selusien keil one viteni vit,

p.span: “?Mukave? ?Mengkatien keil orer maeni keke rovasan mahien min meatin tai navong rorlei rahittei veah usite onen en kot keke rovahotin asa koa kei mumoni romaltei? Vuo, romaentei.”

body.p: Hetetamen sav keil avul kati avit, “!Ei! ?Mukave? ?Keik emun kovi koan Kaleli? Munak kilekat visi en selusien vasi keil ten Tus Votut, kilei kilea keke provet tovuol vaka en provins ten out Kaleli.”
Evus, keil vasi uva ris teim se.
Iesu rie lat enmahisien min ahin koa mum tisa ral min meatin tai
Iesu va en Hou Nei Olip ral min meatin keil onen ka amatil ien.
Out mulan, Iesu va ris en teahu ten Eim Votut. Meatin houlu umai veni ka akarahiti, ka Iesu rondan ka visein keil.

Navong mul veah vihisei, tiser keil ten mengkatien keil onen Mosis ka Farasi keil amulamun ahin koa avotini matil ral min meatin tai koa rovitei meatin kati onen. Ka asakin ahin enek mulomal en meten meatin keil.
Evus, aviteni min Iesu avit, “Tiser, ahin ekek, navong avotini, mul semau matil ral min meatin tai koa rovitei meatin kati onen.
Mengkatien onen Mosis viteni keke reheov vini ahin keil vatinek. ?Ka keik, koviten sa?”
Keil avis Iesu mukok keke akilea avahuli kati ven selusien onen.
Ka Iesu malingling, ka mutis tounah tai en atan ral min kalihen.
Ka keil amules avisi vasa kes hihiseien one. Sakini, mulomal ka viteni min keil vit, “Isei en kami koa romumontei tounah vatisa, kei varei heov rohtoh eni.”
Evus, malingling eris, ka mutis tounah tamun en atan.

Navong tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis ka Farasi keil alonge mukok, tetai en keil vasi uva. Koakeil amatu uva mulamu, tai evus, tamun va vio … Iesu kei sasen ro, ka ahin enek mul veah mulomal en meten.
Evus, Iesu mea mulomal ka viteni mini vit, “?Ahin, meatin keil uva kave? ?Mukave? ?Tovuol en keil vato vahit kimat ven tisaen onom?”
Ahin vit kesi vit, “Asuv, meatin tovuol.”
Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “Hesakini, inau mun nirvitentei keke kikur etai mahien. Ka kiha ris teim, ka kosa heha, konoumtei mun natisa.”
Iesu vi meneai onen Ahi min meatin keil ten out netan

Navong Iesu mul veah en teahu ten Eim Votut, selus eris min meatin keil vit, “Inau navi meneai en out netan koa ritin luvat rendemien onen meatin keil. Ka meatin koa mul musil inau hermualtei en mankoli, veni meneai koa hel ien hetitin luvat sise ten moulien mini.”
Farasi keil koa alonge aviteni mini avit, “Keik kos komules koselus en usite onom. Sakini, mesakras mevakur anatin en selusien onom.”

Iesu vit kesi vit, “Anatin keke namul naselus en usite onak. Ka asa koa naviteni anatin veni nakilea out kave naka ien, ka nakilea out koa niha ien. Ka kami mireingeingen out kave naka ien vuo out kave niha ien.
Navong kami milei rahit en usite onak, mimusil rendemien onen meatin keil enges ten out netan. Ka inau, narmultei malei rahit usite onen meatin keil.
Ka avaseini munak nilei rahit usite onen meatin tai, asa koa nihiteni hehi anatin. Veni rovitei inau sasok koa namumoni, ka inau komal Tata onak koa sila inau namita mellei rahit vituai eni.
En mengkatien keil onen Mosis koa kami varei mimusil kati, aviteni keke navong selusien onen meatin elu usil tounah tai luvinvin, meatin keil akilea avakur anatin keke asa luviteni vi anatin.
Sakini, inau naselus en usite onak, ka Tata onak koa sila inau, kei emun mul selus en usite onak.”
Ka avisi avit, “?Mukonek, tata onom kave?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Kami mireingeingen inau ka mireingeingen Tata onak emun. Veni, munak mikilea enau, mivailea en Tata onak emun.”

Navong Iesu viten tounah keil enek, mul en teahu ten Eim Votut, vesesal en out koa aling revi mani ien. Ka avaseini out enek vesesal en out koa hetetamen onen Siu keil alah ruai ien, meatin tovuol vahuli kati, veni avong onen romaitei veah.
Iesu vit luvat matien onen

Evus, Iesu vit risi min tiser keil ten mengkatien onen Mosis ka Farasi keil vit, “Inau niha en out sav tai, ka avaseini mihelekat vis inau, kami miherhotintei inau. Kami mihemat ka mihekur mahien ven tisaen keil onami. Out koa inau niha ien, kami misakras mivaha ien.”

Hetetamen keil onen Siu keil areingeingen aneite ten selusien onen Iesu. Sakini aselus min keil eris avit, “?Vensa varei viteni keke rosakras rovaha en out koa kei heha ien? ?Hemukave? ?Hou vini kei sasen enges?”
Iesu vit risi vit, “Kami mivi ten out netan enges. Ka inau, navi ten out nesa. Kami mivi meatin keil ten out netan, ka inau narvitei ten out netan.
Sakini, naviteni keke kami mihemat ka mihekur mahien ven tisaen keil onami. Veni munak kami miherkurtei anatin eni keke inau navi kei,
anatin keke mihemat hetal min tisaen keil onami.”
Keil amutimanin avit, “?!Keik kovi isei varei!?”
Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “Mulamu rokol kosa, namul navit usil inau min kami.

Inau nakilea maselus usil tounah houlu koa tisa vaha kat usite onami. Ka namul navit leini min meatin keil ten out netan asas koa Tata viteni minau veni nakilea keke kei koa sila inau namita vi anatin.”
Navong Iesu mul vit usil Tata onen, keil areingeingeni keke Iesu mul selus usil Tata onen en out nesa.
Sakini, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Navong kami mihou lat Natin Meatin hehina nesa,
mihelei kilea keke inau navi kei.
En avong koanek miheilea suk keke narmumon etai tounah vousil rendemien onak sasok. Ka namul naviten asas koa Tata onak mul viseinau eni.
Ka kei koa sila inau mul venau ka rolokoveintei inau. Veni, lisenges, namul namumon asas koa mal en meten.”
Navong Iesu viten tounah keil enek, meatin keil houlu akur anatin eni keke vi Mesaea anatin.
Iesu vit usil asa koa hetie lat meatin keil kati onen
Evus, Iesu lesi keke tei en Siu keil akur anatin eni, ka viteni min keil vit, “Munak mihehikiti keke mihelong kat hihiseien keil onak, hetie lati keke mihehi meatin keil onak anatin.
Miheilea asa koa vi anatin, ka anatinien enek hesakin kami mihemaluv anatin.”
Ka keil avit, “Komai mevi vatiamal onen Ebraham, ka mervitei slev onen etai meatin en avong etai.
?Sakini, vensa varei koviteni keke komai mehemaluv anatin?”
Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Naviteni anatin min kami keke meatin vasi koa amumon tisaen umai avi slev keil teni.
Ka slev tai, vulin tovuol en vatiamal kati onen masta onen. Ka natin masta enek, vulin kati en vatiamal onen mul lisenges.
Sakini, munak Natin Ahi sakinuk komaluv, kimaluv anatin.

Nakilea keke kami mivi vatiamal onen Ebraham keil. Ka avaseini, mimul misak visi mivalekat sise keke mivou vini nau vaka ien. Ka emi vati keke mivou vini nau veni out tovuol en tinomi keke selusien onak vaha vato ien.
Inau namul navit mesein asa koa nalesi navong naro ral min Tata onak. Ka kami, mimul mimumon asa koa tata onami viteni min kami keke mivoumoni.”
Keil avit kesi avit, “Tata onomai Ebraham.”
Ka Iesu viteni vit, “Munak kami mivi titan Ebraham keil anatin, kami mivaleisungein sakien keil onen.
Inau navit meseini min kami anatinien koa Ahi viteni minau. Ka kami, misak visi mivou vini inau. Koanek rovitei sakien keil onen Ebraham.
Vuo. Kami mimul mimumon sakien keil onen tata kati onami.”
Ka keil aviteni avit, “!Ei! !Rovitei komai koa mevi ehon keil ten sise! Tata onomai tas, koa vi Ahi varei.”
Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Munak vi anatin keke Ahi vi Tata onami, envatien onami val enau. Veni inau naka ven Ahi, ka kosa, namul ekok. Narmaitei vousil rendemien onak, ka Ahi sila inau.
Ka nakilea vensa varei kami misakras mivalong kilea asa koa naviteni. Veni emi rovattei mivailea en selusien keil onak.

Tata onami vi Temat varei ka emi vati mivoumon asa koa kei en vati kami mivoumoni. Veni kei sakin meatin keil amu vinvini mesav keil en avong telamu rokol kosa. Kei romultei en usite ten anatinien, veni anatinien tovuol ien. Navong mul liluvos, mul viten selusien kati onen, veni kei vi uti luvosien ka vi tata onen koakeil aliluvos.
Sakini, veni asa koa inau naviteni min kami vi anatin, kami mirkurtei anatin enau.
?Isei en kami kilea vahit lat asa varei namumoni tisa? Misakras. ?Ka munak naviten asa koa vi anatin, vensa varei mirkurtei anatin en selusien keil onak?
Koakeil avi meatin keil onen Ahi amul along kilea selusien keil onen. Ka kami mirvitei onen Ahi, sakini mirlong kileatei.”
Siu keil aselus karen Iesu avit, “!Ei! Meviteni anatin navong mevit kotisa suval koan Sameria tai ka ninin tisa tai mul enuk.”
Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “Ninin tisa tovuol enau. Inau navouhou min Tata onak, ka kami mirvouhoutei minau.
Narsak vistei mahou lat isok vahina nesa. Ka tai mul koa en vati vahou lat isok, ka kei helei rahit usite onami.
Naviteni anatin min kami keke koakeil along kat hihiseien keil onak irvatei en matien en avong etai.”

Siu keil aviteni mini avit, “Ekek, mekilea revi keke ninin tisa mul enuk. Ven Ebraham mat, ka provet keil emun onen Ahi umatmat. Ka keik komul koviteni keke koakeil along kat hihiseien keil onom irvatei en matien en avong etai.

?Mukave? ?Komul koviteni keke kovi hetetamen imok mulin avu Ebraham koa mat? ?Ka mukave en provet keil? ?Komul koviteni keke kovi hetetamen imok mulin keil, veni keil emun umat? ?Keik komul koviteni keke kovi isei varei?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Munak inau navou lat sasok en isok, eis koanek hehi heisav enges. Ka vi Tata onak koa mul vou lat isok. Kami miviteni mivit kei vi Ahi onami,
ka mireingeingen kei. Ka inau nakilea, ka nasakras maliluvos mahit nareingeingeni. Veni vamukonek mahi uti luvosien vasuval kami. Anatin, inau nakilea, ka namul nalong kat selusien keil onen.
Ebraham, avu onami, kei mundem kilea keke avong onak hekistal, ka si kei houlu veni.”
Siu keil aviteni mini avit, “Sua onom rorokoltei veah hanumau elu ka halualim emun (50). ?Sakini, kovit koles Ebraham mukave?”
Iesu vit risi min keil vit, “Inau naviteni anatin min kami keke navong Ebraham arvasitei veah,
inau NAVI.”
Eksodas 3:14
Navong Siu keil along asa koa Iesu viteni, alah ahat keil avit avove. Ka Iesu va suai ran keil ka lokovein teahu ten Eim Votut.
Iesu sak revi meatin koa meten var navong avasi
Navong Iesu mul mual va, les meatin tai koa meten var navong avasi emai.
Ka navong meatin keil onen Iesu alesi, avisi avit, “?Tiser, tisaen onen sei mumon meten meatin enek var navong avasi? ?Tisaen keil onen kei sasen enges, vuo tisaen keil onen tata ka mama onen?”

Iesu vit kesi vit, “Rovitei ven tisaen keil onen, vuo tisaen keil onen tata ka mama onen koa mumon meten meatin enek var navong avasi. Kei vi metovar mukok keke Ahi kilea vatie lat keihoen onen vaka en moulien onen.
Navong meneai mul veah ritin, reheles rehoumon umen onen Ahi koa sila inau. Veni vongien mul mai, ka, en avong enek, meatin sakras emun voum.
Ka navong namul veah en out netan, inau navi meneai teni.”
Navong viten selusien enek evus, Iesu mutiv en atan ka mumoni vi tanmelmel. Evus, sahula tanmelmel enek en meten keilu onen metovar.
Evus, Iesu viteni mini vit, “Kiha kikas veinam en Meterumrum Saelom.” (Isen Saelom, aneite teni vi ‘sila.’) Sakini, metovar enek va ka kas veinan. Navong kasi evus, kilea valele ka va ris teim sen.

Navong onen keil ka koakeil akilea mul viram en meatin keil ven mani alesi, amutimanin avit, “?Mukave? ?Vi anatin keke koanik vi metovar koa, lisenges, melesi mul rondan ka viram en meatin keil ven mani?”
Keil koa avit, “Anatin, kei keinek.”
Ka keil koa mun avit, “Vuo, vi meatin sav koa melesi suvali.”
Ka kei varei viteni vit, “!Vi inau varei!”
Ka amules avisi avit, “?Asa kur out koa sakinuk kokilea kovalele vamukok?”
Kei vit kesi vit, “Meatin tai, isen Iesu, mumon tanmelmel ka sahula en metok keilu. Evus, viteni minau keke niha en Meterumrum Saelom ka nikas veinak. Navong namumoni, hatte tas, nakilea malele.”
Meatin keil avisi avit, “?Ka meatin enek mul kave?”
Ka meatin enek vit kesi vit, “Nareingeingeni.”
Onen keil amulamun meatin koa mulamu vi metovar va min Farasi keil.

Navong Farasi keil ales meatin enek, avisi keke meten maluv mukave keke lele mukok. Sakini, meatin enek viteni min keil vit, “Iesu ling tanmelmel en metok keilu. Ka navong nakas veinak, nakilea malele suk.” Ka Farasi keil avotini keke Iesu mumon tanmelmel ka mum revi meten metovar enek en Sabat.
Navong Farasi keil along tunien onen meatin koa mulamu vi metovar, keil koa avit, “Iesu sakras vaka ven Ahi, veni kei rolong kattei mengkatien ten Sabat.”
Ka keil koa mun avit, “?Munak vi anatin keke rokatei ven Ahi, mukave suk kei kilea voumon merikel keil ekek?” Mukonek, Farasi keil akur rendemien elu usili.
Sakini, Farasi keil avis meatin enek hatte tai ris avit, “Vi keik koa meatin enek mum revi metom keilu keke kokilea kovalele. ?Komundem sa usil meatin enek? ?Vi isei varei?”
Meatin enek vit kesi vit, “Inau nakur anatin keke kei vi provet tai.”
Navong hetetamen keil onen Siu keil umai ales meatin enek, arkurtei anatin eni keke, mulamu, kei vi metovar tai. Ka akilea suk vi anatin navong avise tata ka mama onen lumai ka avis revi keilu eni.
Avis keilu avit, “?Vi anatin keke meatin ekek vi titamil? Ka kamil milvit vi metovar navong avasi. ?Mukonek, mukave suk kei kilea valele kosa?”
Keilu luvit kesi luvit, “Komal melkilea keke vi titamal. Ka melkilea emun keke meten var navong avasi emai.
Ka melreingeingeni suk mukave kei kilea valele kosa, vuo isei varei sak revi meten keilu. Ka kami mikilea mivahisi, veni kei matu vinvin vaselus en usite onen kei sasen.”

Tata ka mama onen meatin enek luviteni mukok veni lumetaun hetetamen keil onen Siu keil. Lulonge keke hetetamen keil avit leini tuai keke meatin vasi keil koa avit lati keke Iesu vi Mesaea, iso lat keil ran eim tahihiseien keil onen Siu keil.
Sakini, keilu luviteni min hetetamen keil keke titaealu matu vinvin vaselus en usite onen.

Sakini, avong tamun, keil avise meatin koa avasi meten var keke vamai valomal en mete. Evus, avul kati avit, “!Kihat kati en isen Ahi ten hetetamenien keke asa koa komul koviteni vi anatin! Veni komai mekilea tuai keke Iesu enek vi meatin tisa tai.”
Ka meatin enek vit kesi vit, “Narkileatei munak meatin enek vi meatin tisa tai, vuo asa. Ka tounah tas nakilea. Mulamu, metok var, ka kosa, nalele.”
Ka keil avis risi avit, “?Kei mumon sa enuk? ?Mum revi metom keilu en sakien sa?”

Sakini, meatin enek vit kesi vit, “Naviteni tuai min kami, ka kami emi rovattei mivalonge. ?Vensa varei emi vati mivataengon ris tunien onak? ?Vahesa kami mun emi vati mivamai mivahi meatin keil onen?”
Navong alonge mukok, hetetamen keil onen Siu keil aselus kutut kat meatin enek avit, “!Ei, keik varei kovi meatin tai onen! Ka komai, mivi meatin keil onen Mosis.
Komai mekilea keke Ahi selus min Mosis ka san keihoen mini. Ka en usite onen meatin koanek, mereingeingen out kave kei kur keihoen onen ien.”
Sakini, meatin koa mai lele vit kesi vit, “Namutimanin en selusien keil onami. Miviteni keke mireingeingen out kave kei kur keihoen onen, avaseini keke kei mum revi metok keilu.
Rokilea keke Ahi rolongtei meatin tisa keil koa avisi ven tounah. Ka mul long hisien onen meatin tai koa mul vouhou mini ka mul long kat asa koa en vati.
Navong Ahi mum rohtoh en out netan rokol kosa, meatin sav tovuol koa sak revi meten meatin tai koa vi metovar navong avasi.
Ka meatin enek mumoni. Munak Iesu rokatei ven Ahi, kei sakras voumon merikel keil ekek.”

Navong alonge mukok, hetetamen onen Siu keil aselus keih mini avit, “!Keik kotisaso revi mok en avong avasuk mai rokol kosa! ?Vensa varei kosak visi kovahisein komai?” Ka aso lati ran eim tahihiseien one.
Navong Iesu kur longlongien keke aso lat meatin koa mai lele enek ran eim tahihiseien onen Siu keil, va votini. Navong votini, visi vit, “?Keik kokur anatin en Natin Meatin?”
Meatin enek vit kesi vit, “Asuv, kihiteni minau li keke kei vi isei. Hemukonek, nakilea makur anatin eni.”
Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “Keik kolesi tuai. Inau koa namul naselus ral minuk navi kei.”
Navong longe mukok, meatin enek va netan min Iesu ka viteni vit, “O Asuv, nakur anatin enuk eli varei.”
Iesu vit, “Numai en out netan keke malei rahit usite onen meatin keil. Anatin, numai keke masakin koakeil arleletei, avamai avalele, ka matie lati keke koakeil avit alele, mete var.”
Tei en Farasi keil amul vesesal, ka navong along selusien onen Iesu avisi avit, “?Mukave? ?Komul koviteni keke metomai var?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Munak metomi var anatin, miherkurtei mahien ven asa tisa koa mimul mimumoni. Ka veni mivit milele revi, mihekur vasin mahien ten tisaen keil onami.”
Tatavolien usil meatin koa losil kat revi sipsip keil osen

Iesu viteni min Farasi keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, meatin keil ekek asuval sipsip keil osen Ahi. Ka koakeil armaitei en yad one avaka en meteau kati, ka amul uvut laui vieh teni, keil avi tarhena keil ka lariken keil.
Ka kei koa va neim en yad ka en meteau teni, kei vi meatin kati koa mul losil kat sipsip keil osen.
Navong mai, meatin koa mul lei kokoe en yad lei kilea eni ka sehen meteau veni. Ka navong kei vise retai en sipsip osen keil en ise kati, sipsip keil along kilea ren, ka kei mulamun keil uva hae.
Ka navong lah lat osen keil vasi uva hae, kei mual mulamu en keil. Sipsip keil osen amusil kati veni along kilea ren.
Keil asakras avousil meatin sav tai. Anatin, ilohosai rani veni arlong kileatei ren.”
Farasi keil along tatavolien koa Iesu viteni min keil, ka areingeingen aneite teni.
Sakini, Iesu vit kilea min keil vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, inau navi meteau koa sipsip keil uva neim ien.
Meatin keil koa umai mulamu enau, keil vasi avi tarhena ka lariken keil. Ka sipsip keil arlong kattei keil.

Tarhena keil umai keke avahenan tounah, avou vini sipsip keil, ka avapurun tounah keil. Ka inau navi meteau ten yad. Ka koakeil umai neim ka uva hae aka enau, Ahi houtut moulien one, ka ihotin oumunai koa hetahos. Anatin, numai keke nakilea masan moulien min meatin keil, moulien tai koa vilelau en tahosien.
“Ka inau navi more meatin talosilkatien onen sipsip keil emun. Ka inau nasak mesei keke mamae lat moulien onak ka mamat vahinat sipsip keil osak.

Munak meatin toumien enges mul losil kat sipsip keil les huli rendan tai mai, kei hemetau ka helohosai ran sipsip keil veni arvitei osen kati. Hesakini, huli rendan enek hemai heat vini tei en sipsip keil ka helikat rasilin teisav keil.
Anatin, meatin toumien mul lohosai veni kei losil kat keil keke vakur ui umen teni enges, ka envatien onen romultei en sipsip keil.

Ka inau navi more meatin talosilkatien onen sipsip keil. En vati sakien koa Tata onak kilea enau ka inau nakilea eni, inau nakilea en sipsip keil osak ka keil akilea enau. Ka nasak mesei keke mamae lat moulien onak mamat vahinat keil.
“Sipsip sav keil osak amul koa ateisav en sipsip keil koa amul en yad koanek.
Mal keke niha nilah keil emun imai. Keil ilong rek, ka imai ilah ruai hetal min sipsip keil ekek. Hemukonek, imai ihi vangi sipsip hetas, ka inau tas nihi meatin talosilkatien one.
Tata onak, envatien onen mul enau veni nasak mesei masa lat moulien onak en usite one. Ka hekatau, nakilea makur risi.

Meatin tovuol vakulat moulien onak ranau. Ka naling rendemien onak keke masa lati. Inau nakur keihoen keke masa lat moulien onak, ka nakur keihoen keke makur risi. Koanik vi asa koa Tata onak meng kat inau keke moumoni.”
Navong meatin keil along selusien keil onen, Siu keil akur rendemien elu usil Iesu.
Keil houlu amul aviteni avit, “!Ninin tisa tai mul ien ka sakini selus vau! ?Vensa varei kami mimul milong selusien keil onen?”

Ka keil koa mun amul aviteni avit, “Selusien onen rosuvaltei selusien onen meatin tai koa ninin tisa tai mul ien. Ka meatin koa ninin tisa mul ien sakras voumon metovar tai valele vasuval koa Iesu mumoni.”
Hetetamen keil onen Siu keil asesein Iesu
Avati elu muli va, ka vi Disemba, avong mal keke avoumon Ale ten Tokolkatien
en out Serusalem.
Iesu emai ka mul mual en teahu ten Eim Votut, out tai koa avise en veranda onen Solomon.
Navong Siu keil alesi, akarahiti ka avisi avit, “?Nengeis varei kihit luvati min komai keke kovi isei varei? Munak kovi Mesaea anatin koa Ahi vat kati vit hesani hemai, kihit leini.”
Ka Iesu vit kesi vit, “Navit leini tuai min kami. Ka kami mirkurtei anatin eni. Tounah keil koa namumoni en keihoen onen Tata onak arie lati keke navi isei.
Ka avaseini, kami mirkurtei anatin enau veni mirvitei sipsip keil osak.
Veni sipsip keil osak along kilea rek. Inau nakilea en keil, ka keil amusil inau.
Min keil, namul nasan moulien ten lisenges ka irvuoltei en avong etai. Ka meatin tovuol kilea vasav lat keil ran hek.
Tata onak san keil minau, ka kei marite mok mulin tounah vasi. Sakini, meatin tovuol kilea vasav lat keil ran hen Tata.
Ka Tata onak ka inau meltas.”
Navong along selusien one, Siu keil alah ahat keil keke avov vini.
Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Inau namumon mormore tounah keil houlu en metomi koa Tata onak san keihoen minau moumoni mormore tounah keil houlu. ?More umen sa varei keke miheov vini inau veni?”

Avit kesi avit, “!Komai emai rovattei mevov vinik ven more umen tai, ka mevit meheov vinik veni komul koselus kekar va kat Ahi varei! !Keik kovi meatin kuren tai ten out netan enges, ka koselus suval keik kovinvin ral min Ahi!”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Amutisi en mengkatien keil onami avit,
‘Kami mivi ahi keil.’
Sam keil 82:6
Rokilea keke selusien onen Ahi rovilestei. Sakini, munak Tus Votut vise meatin keil ekek en
ahi keil
anatin imok en inau. Veni inau navi kei koa Tata rie lat inau ka sila inau namita en out netan. Sakini, narselus kekartei vaha kat Ahi navong naviteni keke navi Natnali.
“Munak narmumontei merikel keil koa Tata onak sani minau moumoni, mal keke mirkurtei anatin enau.

Ka munak namul namumon merikel keil, avaseini mirkurtei anatin enau, mal keke mihekur anatin en tounah koa namul namumoni. Hemukonek, miheilea keke Tata mul kapil vituai ral minau, ka inau namul nakapil vituai ral mini.”
Hatte tamun, asak visi avahuli kat Iesu, ka kei mea ran he.
Evus, Iesu va en Oaisal Sodan ka mu kotehei va en usite. Iesu ka meatin keil onen aro ekonek, en out koa, mulamu, Sion vi baptaes en meatin keil ien.
Meatin houlu umai keke avalesi. Ka amul aviteni min keil eris avit, “Avaseini keke Sion romumon etai merikel, tounah vasi koa kei viteni usil meatin enek mai vi anatin.”
Ka meatin keil houlu ekonek akur anatin keke Iesu vi Mesaea koa Ahi vat kati vit hesani hemai.
Matien onen Lasaros
Meatin tai mul en meteimal ten out Betani, isen Lasaros. Kei mesai houlu. Ahin elu emun lumul en meteimal enek, isealu Meri ka Marata koa luvi ahinali.
(Meri vi ahinen Lasaros koa mesai, ka hehi kei koa, hervitei tuetin, hetahin senta heha en alen Asuv ka houul moteini en hilin.
Ahinen Lasaros keilu lusan selusien va min Iesu koa vit, “Asuv, kei koa envatien onom mul ien mesai houlu.”
Navong Iesu raengoni, vit, “Keite ten mesaien koanek hervitei matien. Koanik mul kur out vahati lat isen Ahi keke meatin keil ilei kilea hetetamenien onen Natnali.”
Ka avaseini envatien onen Iesu mul en Marata, Meri ka Lasaros marite,
navong kur longlongien keke Lasaros mesai mukok, ro enges en out koa mul ien avong elu eris.
Evus, Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Reheha ris ven Lasaros keitel en provins ten out Sudea.”
Ka meatin keil onen avisi avit, “Tiser, rovitei tuetin, Siu keil en out enek asak visi avov vinik. ?Ka keik em vati kovaha ris?”
Iesu viteni vit, “En avong tai, meneai mul ritin haoa teindan elu (12). Ka koakeil amual en meneai asakras avasavoi, veni meneai enek mul sakin keil alei kilea tounah vasi.
Ka koakeil amual en mankoli ten vongien amusavoi, veni meneai tovuol en keil.”
Evus, Iesu vit risi vit, “Tuer eli Lasaros matil usae. Ka inau niha ka nisisil eni hemea.”
Sakini, meatin keil onen aviteni avit, “Asuv, munak kei matil usae, kei mul moul ka helonge hetahos eris.”
Keil amundemi keke Iesu mul selusien usil matilien onen Lasaros, ka mul vit usil matien onen varei.
Sakini, Iesu vit leini min keil vit, “Lasaros mat tuai.
Ka nasi inau keke narrotei vatal min keil en avong enek, veni koanek hekataun kami keke mihekur anatin imok enau. Rovaha veni.”
Sakini, Tomas, koa avise en Maeh, viteni min keil vit, “Ir vasi reheha keke rehemat vituai hetal mini.”
Iesu mumon Lasaros moul eris ran matien veni vi vatte ten moulien
Navong Iesu rokol meteimal ten out Betani, kei votini keke aling teiai onen Lasaros en valengeihat tatetahinien avong ehat tuai.
Betani rovitei soutin ran out Serusalem, vi kilomita etel (3 km) enges.
Sakini, Siu keil houlu umai keke avatie lat enmahisien one min Marata ka Meri ven matien onen tuealu.
Navong Marata kur longlongien keke Iesu mul mai, kei eva vahisu mini. Ka Meri ro nges teim.
Navong Marata les Iesu, viteni mini vit, “Asuv, vahit keik kovato ekok, tuak onak varmattei.
Ka nakilea keke kosa ekek, Ahi hesani minuk asa koa kovisi veni.”
Iesu viteni mini vit, “Tumali hemoul eris ran matien.”
Marata vit kesi vit, “Nakilea keke kei hemoul ris ran matien en keite ten tounah vasi.”
Iesu viteni mini vit, “Inau navi vatte ten mearisien ka navi vatte ten moulien. Koakeil akur anatin enau, avaseini umat, keil imea ris ran matien ka imoul.
Ka koakeil amoul semau ka akur anatin enau, keil irmattei en avong etai. ?Mukave? ?Kokur anatin en koanik?”
Kei vit kesi vit, “Asuv, nakur anatin eni keke keik kovi Mesaea, Natin Ahi, koa kei vat kati keke hesani hemita en out netan.”
Navong Marata selus ral min Iesu evus, va ris teim ka vise suain tunahin Meri. Kur seh eni ka viteni mini vit, “Tiser mai ekonek ka mul visuk.”
Navong Meri longe mukok, mea kalah ka va hae keke vahisu vatal mini.
Navong koakeil amul amurang ral mini alesi mukave mea kalah, keil amusili. Amundemi kei mul va en valengeihat tatetahinien keke vatang en out enek.
Iesu rosin Meri en out koa Marata visu mini koa mul hae en meteimal ten out Betani.
Navong Meri rokol out koa Iesu mul ien, lesi ka retengeiril vesesal ven alen Iesu ka murang vit, “!O Asuv, vahit kovato ekok, tuak onak varmattei!”
Navong Iesu lesi mul murang mukok, ka lesi mukave meatin keil koa aro ral mini emun amul amurang, longe tisa ka tin mis.
Kei vis keil vit, “?Mirahini en out kave?”
Avit kesi avit, “Asuv, amai lesi.”
Navong uva, simeten Iesu motmot.
Ka koakeil alesi aviteni avit, “Milesi. En vat tunali mok.”
Ka tei en keil aviteni avit, “Kei sakin meatin koa meten var mai lele eris. ?Vensa varei sakras vasak revi Lasaros keke varmattei?”
Navong arokol valengeihat tatetahinien, Iesu longe tisa eris. Lesi keke arein mari ahat tai ring koe metareh ten valengeihat enek.
Sakini, Iesu viteni vit, “Altei lat ahat vaha.”
Marata, ahinen meatin koa mat, vit kesi vit, “Asuv, vite vo tuai veni emat avong ehat tuai.”
Ka Iesu viteni mini vit, “Naviteni tuai minuk keke kiles keihoen onen Ahi munak kikur anatin eni.”
Sakini, meatin keil arei lat ahat eva. Evus, Iesu lele vina nesa ka vit, “Tata, namasmasuk veni komul kolong inau.
Nakilea keke lisenges komul kolong inau, ka navit lein selusien koanek ven meatin keil ekek, vasakin keil ikur anatin eni keke kosan inau numai.”
Navong viten selusien enek evus, Iesu viso keih vit, “!Lasaros, amai hae!”

Ka meatin koa mat mea mai hae. Mavuli kaliko tatetahinien keil amul veah apar kat aven vasi, hen ka alen ka veinan emun. Sakini, Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Alleh lat kaliko rani ka mihemaeni hemaluv heha.”
Navong Siu keil koa amusil Meri ales asa koa Iesu mumoni, keil akur anatin eni.
Ka tei en keil uva ven Farasi keil, ka avit meseini min keil asa koa Iesu mumoni.
Sakini, Farasi keil ka asuv keil onen pris keil avise ruain Kaonsel one. Navong alah ruai, avis keil eris avit, “?Rehoumon sa varei hetal min Iesu? Kei mules mumon merikel keil houlu.

Munak reheles rehemaeni hel houm hemukonek, meatin vasi keil ikur anatin eni ka isak visi keke umoni hemai hehi asuv houlu one. !Hemukonek, me-Rom keil imai ka u lin Eim Votut orer, ka u vinvini meatin vasi keil en kantri orer ten out Isrel!”
Tai en Kaonsel, isen Kaiafas. Kei vi asuv houlu onen pris keil ten sua koanek. Ka navong long selusien onen koakeil ten Kaonsel, viteni min keil vit, “!Kami mireingeingen tounah!
Hetahos imok munak meatin hetas hemat en usite onen meatin keil, helin munak rehemaen me-Rom keil imai u vini me-Isrel vasi keil.”
Kaiafas rovitentei selusien koanik en rendemien onen enges. Ka, en umen onen suval asuv houlu onen pris keil ten sua koanek, kei vit luvati keke Iesu hemat hehinat me-Isrel vasi keil.
Ka vit luvati emun keke Iesu hemat en usite onen koakeil vasi avi onen Ahi koa amul en kantri savsav keil keke helah ruain keil vasi imai ihi vangi meatin hetas.
Sakini, en hati avong enek va, hetetamen keil onen Siu keil amumon lingkatien tai keke u vini Iesu.
Sakini Iesu romualtei mun en mesai en meten Siu keil. Lokovein out enek ka eva en meteimal tai, isen Efrem, koa mul vesesal en out volvol. Ka ro ekonek ral min meatin onen keil avong vahis.

Anien ten Mul Laui mai vesesal, ka Siu keil houlu aka en out savsav keil koa mul seh, ka amul avina en out Serusalem. Amul uva keke avoumon sakien keil koa vasakin keil avato mau keke akilea avoumon tounah ten ale enek.
Ka meatin keil amul alekat Iesu. Navong alah ruai en teahu ten Eim Votut, avis retai en keil avit, “?Mimundem sa? ?Iesu hemai en ale koanek, vuo hermaitei?”
Aviteni mukok veni asuv keil onen pris keil ka Farasi keil ameng kati keke meatin tai koa kilea out kave koa Iesu mul ien hemai hehit meseini min keil keke akilea avaha avahuli kati.
Ahin tai ten out Betani vouhou min Iesu
Avong ahetai (6) mulamu en avong ten Anien ten Mul Laui, Iesu va en meteimal ten out Betani. Va ro en teim onen Lasaros, meatin koa sakini moul eris ran matien.
Sakini, keil amumon mari anien tai keke avahouhou mini. Marata lah anien emai, ka Lasaros rondan vituai en avet taanianien ral min Iesu ka meatin sav keil.
Evus, Meri kur hati senta tai koa amumon en nard
koa mani teni mariso vis mariso mok. Va vesesal ven Iesu ka mutahi en alen keke vahouhou mini. Evus, Meri muuli en hilin. Navong mumoni, more vite ten senta enek ka vasi out neim.
Ka, navong tai en meatin teindan elu (12) onen Iesu lesi, rositei veni. Isen meatin enek Sudas Eskariot koa, hervitei tuetin, hemae lat Iesu heha en hen vativieh keil onen. Sakini, kei vit,

p.span: “?Vensa varei arsalem entei senta koanik keke avasan mani teni min koakeil tounah one tovuol. Veni mani teni vinvin en silva mani handred etel (300).”

body.p: Kei rovitentei selusien enek veni mundem houlu usil koakeil tounah one tovuol. !Vuo! Viteni mukok veni vi tarhena tai. Veni kei lei kat ateli ten mani onen Iesu keitel, ka mul venan mani rani.
Ka Iesu viteni vit, “!Lokoveini! Ahin ekek vul senta koanek keke vasak mesein avek vamese ven avong tatetahinien onak.
Koakeil tounah one tovuol ito hetal min kami lisenges. Ka inau, nirtotei hetal min kami lisenges.”
Avat keil onen Siu keil amumon lingkatien keke u vini Lasaros
Navong meatin keil alonge keke Iesu ro en meteimal ten out Betani, meatin houlu vis houlu mok umai keke avalesi. Umai emun keke avales Lasaros koa Iesu sakini moul eris ran matien.
Ka navong asuv keil onen pris keil alonglong eni, amumon lingkatien keke avou vini Lasaros emun
veni alesi keke merikel koa kistal eni mul sakin meatin houlu akur anatin en Iesu, ka armusiltei mun keil.
Asan masmasien min Iesu navong kistal en out Serusalem
Out mulan, mari vangi meatin keil koa umai en Anien ten Mul Laui alonge keke Iesu mul mai en out Serusalem.
Sakini, amusah oumeil keil ka uva avahisu mini. Ka navong uva, avisohiso vina nesa avit,
“!Masmasien min Ahi!
‘!Tokolkatien hel en kei koa mai en isen Iahova!’
Sam keil 118:26
!Tokolkatien hel en asuv houlu ten out Isrel!”
Iesu votin sili dongki tai ka muloh eni eva. Koanek suval asa koa Tus Votut viteni koa vit,
“Kami koa miro en taon ten out Serusalem en Hou Saeon minametautei.
!Mihelesi! Asuv houlu onami mul mai keke valosil kat kami.
Anatin, mul rondan en sili dongki tai enges ka mul mai.”
Sakaraea 9:9

Navong tounah enek mul kur out, teindan elu (12) onen Iesu arkileatei aneite teni. Ka, katau suk, navong Ahi rali lat Iesu vina nesa keke vakur hetetamenien onen, amundem kati keke tounah keil enek koa Tus Votut vit usili mai kistal vi anatin.

Houlu en vangi meatin keil ekek amul ral min Iesu navong vise lat Lasaros ran valengeihat tatetahinien ka sakini moul eris ran matien. Ka keil avitehiteni min mesav keil va vio … meatin houlu along usili.
Sakini, veni meatin keil houlu vis houlu imok along usil merikel koanek, uva avisu min Iesu en sise.

Ka navong Farasi keil ales mari vangi meatin ekek, aviteni min keil eris avit, “!Alles visi! !Meatin vasi keil en out netan amul amusil kati tuai! Misakras emun mivoumon etai tounah vaha kat usite onen.”
Iesu selus usil matien onen min me-Gris keil
Navong Siu keil uva en out Serusalem keke avaha netan min Ahi en avong ten ale, me-Gris otetai keil emun uva.
Me-Gris keil enek uva ven Pilip, koa kei ten meteimal ten out Betsaeta en provins ten out Kaleli. Ka aviteni mini avit, “Komai emai vati mevales Iesu.”
Sakini, Pilip eva ka vit meseini min Andru, ka keilu luva luviteni min Iesu.
Ka Iesu viteni vit, “Avong emai ekek keke Natin Meatin vakur mari hetetamenien onen.

Nita tavol usil anatinien tai min kami. Munak uti uit tai, arluhtei en atan ka arrahintei, kei heles hehi utite. Ka munak itahin uti uit koanek en atan, hesuval koa hemat. Ka, hekatau, hemoul hekur heite hehi houlu.
Koakeil e vat moulien one, moulien enek hevuol ran keil. Ka koakeil tine kat moulien one en out netan ekek, keil varei ihuli kat moulien one hel lisenges.
Koakeil e vati avoum minau, keil usil inau. Veni out koa namul ien, meatin toumien keil onak il hetal minau. Ka Tata onak hehouhou min meatin sei keil koa amum minau.

p.span: “Kosa, tinok vil en demvoen. ?Ka nihiten sa? Vahesa nihis Tata onak keke houtut inau keke nirhisutei en avong takeih koanek. Ka vuo. Veni namita keke mahisu en avong ten mahien enek.”

body.p: Evus, Iesu vis viteni vit, “O Tata li, kihati lat isom keke hehi hetetamen imok.”
Navong vis mukok, rea tai selus ka en out nesa vit, “Nasakin isok mai vi hetetamen tuai, ka num risi.”
Vangi meatin keil koa amulomal ekonek along rea enek, ka tei en keil aviteni avit vi voulul koa mul musel. Ka teimun en keil avit, “!Angelo tai selus mini!”
Ka Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Rea koanek roselustei vakataun inau, selus keke vakataun kami.
Kosa vi avong koa Ahi helei rahit usite onen meatin keil ten out netan ekek ka hesan mahien min keil. Kosa vi avong koa Ahi hehile lat Temat, mari avat ten out netan, heha ran out enek.
Ka navong ihati lat inau nihina nesa en ai tai, nileh meatin vasi keil imai venau.”
Iesu viteni mukok vahit luvat sakien koa hemat heka ien.
Vangi meatin keil avit kesi avit, “Tus Votut onen Ahi mul viteni min ir keke Mesaea heto lisenges.
?Sakini, vensa suk komul koviteni keke ihati lat Natin Meatin hehina nesa en ai tai? ?Isei varei Natin Meatin enek?”

Iesu viteni min keil vit, “Meneai hel ven kami avong hehi havivi tamun. Sakini, hetahos mihoual navong meneai mul veah ritin keke mankoli hermutaluh koetei kami. Veni koakeil amual en mankoli areingeingen out kave uva ien.
Sakini, mihekur anatin en meneai enek navong mul veah ritin, keke mihemai mihehi meatin keil ten meneai.” Navong Iesu selus min meatin keil evus, lokovein keil ka ro suai ran keil.
Ka avaseini keke Iesu mumon merikel keil houlu en mete, rovitei meatin vasi keil koa akur anatin eni.
Koanek kur out vasakin asa koa provet Aesea viteni vamai vahi anatin koa vit,
“?Iahova, munak meatin tai vit usil longlongien enek mulamu,
isei hekur anatin eni?
?O Iahova, isei kilea valei kilea hem,
en sakien keil koa kistal ekek?”
Aesea 53:1
Sakini, keil asakras avakur anatin eni, veni Aesea viteni mun vit,
“Ahi houmon mete hevar ka tine hekeih imok,
keke asakras avalei kilea vatal min mete,
ka asakras avandem kilea en tine asa koa kei mumoni.
Hemukonek, irvilestei ran tisaen keil one
ka Ahi hersak revitei moulien one.”
Aesea 6:10
Aesea viten selusien koanik veni lei kilea hetetamenien onen Iesu ka vit luvati.

Ka avaseini keke koanek vi anatin, hetetamen keil houlu onen Siu keil akur anatin en Iesu, ka ametau keke avahit leini. Ametauni veni Farasi keil aviteni keke koakeil vasi avit leini keke Iesu vi Mesaea, iso lat keil ran eim tahihiseien keil one.
Hetetamen keil enek arie lati keke e vati avoumon asa koa vatahos en meten meatin keil vali asa koa vatahos en meten Ahi.
Iesu vit leini keke koakeil aseseini ikur mahien en hen Ahi
Iesu viso keih vit, “Koakeil akur anatin enau, rovitei inau nges koa akur anatin eni. Amul arie lati keke akur anatin emun en kei koa san inau numai.
Veni koakeil ales inau, suval koa amul ales kei koa san inau numai.
Numai navi meneai koa ritin en meatin keil ten out netan, keke koakeil vasi akur anatin enau irmultei mun en mankoli.
Munak meatin tai long selusien onak ka rolong kattei, inau nirsantei mahien mini. Veni narmaitei en out netan keke masan mahien min meatin keil teni. Vuo, numai keke moutut keil.

Ka koakeil asesein inau ka aling rendemien keke irkurtei anatin en selusien onak, tai mul koa hesan mahien min keil. Ka en keite ten tounah vasi, en avong ten Mari Kot, selusien keil onak heat ris keil ka hetie lati keke mal ikur mahien.
Koanik hehi anatin, veni narvitentei tounah keil koa ka en rendemien onak sasok, ka namul naviten tounah keil koa Tata koa san inau numai meng kat inau keke mahiteni.
Sakini, namul navit mesein selusien etin koa Ahi meng kat inau keke mahiteni, veni nakilea keke meatin keil ihotin moulien ten lisenges heka ien.”
Iesu kanian ekor ral min meatin keil onen ka rie lat sakien koa en vat keil avaleisungeini

Vi avong tai mulamu en avong ten Anien ten Mul Laui. Iesu kilea tuai keke avong mai vesesal keke helokovein out netan ka hehina ven Tata onen. Ka veni envatien onen mul en meatin keil koa Ahi sani mini, Iesu vit vatie lat envatien onen min keil hetokol keite ten moulien onen.
En vongien enek, Iesu mul kanian ral min meatin keil onen. Ka Temat san rendemien tuai min Sudas, natin Saemon Eskariot, keke hemae lat Iesu heha en hen vativieh keil onen.
Iesu kilea keke Tata ling tounah vasi keil en hen tuai, ka kilea emun keke ka ven Ahi ka hehina ris mini.
Sakini, mea ran avet taanianien, kulat eisin omon koa hae ka lokovein eisin koa ka neim mules. Evus, mutoh kat kei en taol tai.
Musin mukok evus, mutah oai va en pesin tai, ka va ven meatin keil onen. Evus, kas retai en ale ka muul motein keil ral min taol koa mutoh kat kei eni.
Iesu va ven Saemon Pita koa viteni mini vit, “?Asuv, vensa varei keik kokas alok?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Keik korkileatei veah asa koa namul namumoni, ka hekatau, kilea suk.”
Ka Pita viteni keih vit, “!Vuo, kirkastei alok en avong etai!”
Iesu vit, “Munak nirkastei alom, usite onom tovuol enau.”
Ka Saemon Pita vit, “!Asuv, munak hemukonek, konakasteis alok! !Kikas hek keilu ka vatuk emun!”
Iesu viteni mini vit, “Koakeil amukul amutolas tuai, irkastei mun ave vasi. Vi ale sesuk koa ikas risi. Sakini, kami mimuto tuai, ka rovitei kami vasi koa mivato.”
(Iesu viten selusien enek vit, “Rovitei kami vasi koa mivato,” veni kilea tuai isei hemae lati.)
Navong Iesu kas ale evus, musin eris en eisin omon koa ka hae, ka rondan eris en vulin en avet taanianien. Rondan evus, viteni min keil vit, “?Kami mikilea aneite ten asa koa namumoni min kami?
Mivise inau en ‘Tiser’ ka ‘Asuv,’ ka mal keke mimumoni mukonek, veni vi anatin.
Sakini, munak inau, Asuv ka Tiser onami, naling rendemien onak va netan ka nakas motein alomi, mal keke kami emun mihekekas motein alomi eris.
Inau namumon sakien enek keke kami mikilea mivaleisungeini. Mukonek, miheha mihekataun mesav keil hetal min rendemien koa netan hesuval etin koa inau namumoni min kami.
Anatin eli naviteni min kami, slev tai romaritetei mok valin masta onen, ka eiloheh tai romaritetei mok valin kei koa sila.
Munak mikilea anatinien koanik, tokolkatien hel ven kami munak mihoum housili.
“Ka narmultei maselus usil kami vasi. Navong narie lat kami keke mivousil inau, nakilea en kami tuai. Ka narie lat kami mukok keke Tus Votut hemai hehi anatin koa viteni vit,
‘Meatin koa kanian ral minau, kei varei viles mum tisa minau.’
Sam keil 41:9
“Sakien koanek rokurtei veah out. Ka navit luvati min kami en avong koanek, keke navong hekur out, mihekur anatin eni keke inau navi kei.
Anatin eli naviteni min kami, meatin koa kur revi meatin tai koa nasila, suval koa mul kur revi inau mun. Ka meatin koa kur revi inau, suval koa mul kur revi kei koa sila inau numai.”
Navong Iesu viten koanik evus, tin vilelau en demvoen ka vit leini vit, “Anatin eli naviteni min kami, tai en kami hemae lat inau niha en hen vativieh keil onak.”
Navong meatin keil onen alonge mukok, aleles keil eris, ka areingeingen isei varei koa Iesu mul vit usili.
Tai en meatin keil onen, kei koa envatien onen Iesu mul ien houlu mok,
kei mul rondan en usiven Iesu.
Sakini, Saemon Pita selus mini en hen vit vahis Iesu keke mul selus usil isei varei.
Sakini, meatin onen enek mulis va neli vesesal ven Iesu ka visi vit, “?Asuv, isei varei?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Niling hati veret koanek en sup ekek ka nisani mini. Kei varei keinek.” Sakini, Iesu kur hati veret tai, lingi va en sup, ka sani min Sudas, natin Saemon Eskariot.
Ka Sudas kur hati veret enek. Evus, Temat mai sien rendemien onen Sudas. Ka Iesu viteni min Sudas vit, “Asa koa kovit kovoumoni, kikalah kumoni.”
Tovuol en keil koa arondan en avet taanianien vailea vensa Iesu viten selusien koanik mini.
Tei en keil amundemi keke Iesu mul sila keke vahul tounah ten ale, vuo keke vasan tounah min koakeil mani one tovuol veni vi Sudas koa lei kat mani one.
Sakini, Sudas kur hati veret koa Iesu sani mini ka, hatte tas, va hae. Vongien mai tuai ke.
Iesu san mengkatien hau ten envatien min meatin keil onen
Navong Sudas eva, Iesu viteni vit, “Avong mal keke inau, Natin Meatin, makur eis koa vi hetetamen imok. Ka asa koa numoni hehati lati isen Ahi emun hehina nesa mok.
Ka veni asa koa numoni hehati lat isen Ahi, Ahi varei hehati lat isok, ka houmoni kosa.

“Kami li misuval titiali keil onak. Ka nito hetal min kami avong havivi emun. Hevus, mihelekat inau, ka miherlestei inau. Naviteni min kami selusien koa nasani min hetetamen keil onen Siu keil koa navit, ‘Out koa inau niha ien, kami misakras mivaha ien.’
Ka namul nasan mengkatien hau tai min kami: emi hehathat kami. En vati sakien koa inau ek vat kami, kami emun emi hehathat kami.
Munak kami emi hehathat kami, meatin vasi keil ilei kilea keke mivi meatin keil onak.”
Iesu vit luvati keke Pita hehiteni keke usite onen tovuol en Iesu
Saemon Pita vis Iesu vit, “?Asuv, kiha kave?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Out koa niha ien, kosakras kovousil inau kosa. Ka hekatau, keik kusil inau.”
Ka Pita visi vit, “?Asuv, vensa varei nasakras mousiluk kosa? !Inau nasak mesei keke mamat en usite onom!”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “?Anatin keke kosak mesei kovamat venau? Anatin eli naviteni minuk, out hermulantei mau ka ato herkokorattei mau, ka keik, kihiteni hatte hetel keke usite onom tovuol enau.”
Iesu vi sise keke meatin keil akilea avaha ven Ahi Tata
Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Minandemkotei ka minalongtei natisa. Mihekur anatin en Ahi, ka mihekur anatin enau mun.
En out koa Tata onak ro ien, out tatoien houlu amul ien. Ka inau niha nisak mesein out ven kami.
Koanek anatin, veni munak rovitei anatin marvitentei min kami.
Ka veni anatin keke niha nisak mesein out ven kami, anatin imok keke nimai ris ka nikur kami mihemai hetal minau. Hesakini, kami miheto en out koa inau nito ien.
Ka kami mikilea tuai sise koa va en out koa niha ien.”
Ka Tomas viteni mini vit, “Asuv, komai mereingeingen out koa kiha ien. ?Sakini, hemukave meheilea sise teni?”
Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Inau navi sise, anatinien, ka moulien.
Meatin tovuol vaha ven Tata munak rokatei enau.
Veni mikilea keke navi isei anatin, miheilea Tata onak emun. Ka kosa heha, miheilea eni hesuval koa milesi.”
Pilip viteni mini vit, “Asuv, kitie min komai Tata ka koanek hevinvin ven komai.”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Pilip, naro ral min kami avong taveah tuai. ?Ka keik koreingeingen inau veah? Meatin koa les inau, suval koa les Tata emun. ?Vensa varei kovis inau keke nitie Tata min kami?

?Anatin keke korkurtei anatin veah eni keke inau nakapil ral min Tata, ka Tata mul kapil ral minau? Selusien koa namul naviteni min kami rokatei ven inau sasok. Tata koa nakapil ral mini mul sani minau ka mul sakinau moumon umen onen.
Mihekur anatin eni keke nakapil ral min Tata, ka Tata kapil ral minau. Ka avaseini munak misakras, mihekur anatin enau etin ven tounah keil koa namumoni.
Anatin eli naviteni min kami, koakeil akur anatin enau umon tounah keil koa inau namumoni. Anatin, ka keil umoni hemarite mok helin inau, veni inau niha ven Tata.
Ka navong mihehis ven tounah en isok, numoni keke inau, Natin Ahi, nilea nihati lati isen Tata onak.
Anatin, munak mihehis ven tounah en isok, inau numoni.”
Iesu vat kati keke hesan Ninin Votut min meatin keil onen
Iesu vit risi min meatin keil onen vit, “Munak envatien onami mul enau, mihelong kat mengkatien keil onak.
Hemukonek, nihis Tata onak, ka kei hesan tamun hemai hehi kataunien min kami koa heto hetal kami lisenges.

Naselus usil Ninin koa mul vothot en anatinien onen Ahi. Hervatei ven koakeil avi ten out netan enges veni asakras avalei kilea eni ka areingeingeni. Ka kami mikilea eni veni kei ro ral min kami ka mul kapil vituai ral min kami.
“Navong niha, nirlokoveintei kami hesuval mivi timaru keil. Nimai ris ven kami.
Hervitei tuetin, koakeil avi ten out netan irlestei mun inau, ka kami miheles inau. Ka kami mihemoul, veni inau namoul.
Ka en avong enek, kami miheilea keke inau nakapil ral min Tata onak, ka kami mikapil ral minau, ka inau nakapil ral min kami.

Koakeil akur mengkatien keil onak ka along kati, amul arie lati keke envatien one mul enau. Ka koakeil envatien one mul enau, envatien onen Tata onak hel en keil, ka inau mun, envatien onak hel en keil ka nihothot enau min keil.”
Sudas, koa rovitei Sudas Eskariot, mai ven Iesu ka visi vit, “?Asuv, hemukave suk keik kihothot enuk min komai enges, ka hervitei min mesav keil koa avi ten out netan?”
Iesu vit kesi mini vit, “Koakeil envatien one mul enau ilong kat tounah koa naviteni. Ka, hemukonek, envatien onen Tata onak hel en keil. Komal melhemai melheto ven keil.
Ka koakeil envatien one romultei enau, arlong kattei tounah koa naviteni. Ka asa koa milong inau namul naviteni arkatei ven inau sasok. Aka ven Tata koa sila inau numai.
“Namul naviten tounah keil ekek navong naro veah ral min kami.
Ka Ninin Votut koa hehi kataunien min kami, Tata hesila en isok. Kei hehisein kami en tounah vasi ka hesakin kami mihendem kat tounah vasi koa naviteni min kami.
Anatin keke nilokovein kami, ka namul nasan tomat onak mul en tinomi. Tomat koa nasani min kami rosuvaltei asa koakeil ten out out netan amul asani. Minandemkotei ka minametautei.

“Kami milong inau namul naviteni keke niha ran kami, ka hevus, nimai ris ven kami. Munak envatien onami mul enau anatin, mihesi kami hehi houlu keke nuva ven Tata onak, veni kei vi hetetamen imok mulin inau.
Namul naviten tounah keil enek min kami en avong kosa keke, navong hekistal hehi anatin, mihelei kilea eni ka mihekur anatin en asa koa naviteni.
Nirselustei mun hehi houlu hetal min kami, veni Temat, mari avat ten out netan, mul mai. Kei rokurtei keihoen valin inau,
ka niha en hen hesuval koa Tata meng kat inau keke moumoni. Hemukonek, meatin keil ten out netan ilei kilea keke envatien onak mul en Tata onak.

p.span: “Ale. Almai, rovaha ran out ekek.”

body.p: Tatavolien usil vati grep
Iesu viten tatavolien min meatin keil onen vit, “Inau navi vati grep ka Tata onak suval meatin koa lei kati.
Ka angoite vasi keil koa rosontei heite, kei kum vulvul en keil avaha. Ka angoite vasi keil koa ason heite, kei mul rei motein keil vasakin keil avason heite vahi houlu mok.
Ka kami mimai mimuto tuai ka en hihiseien koa nasani min kami.

Kami mihel miheapil hetal minau, ka inau nil niapil hetal min kami. En vati sakien koa angoi grep koa rokapiltei vatal min vatte sakras vason heite kei sasen enges, kami emun misakras mivason heite en moulien onami munak mirkapiltei vatal minau.
“Inau navi vati grep enek, ka kami mivi angoite keil onak. Koakeil akapil ral minau, ka inau ral min keil, amul ason heite houlu en moulien one. Ka munak mikeka ranau, misakras mivoumon etai tounah.
Koakeil arkapiltei vatal minau asuval angoite keil koa amukou ka amemes. Angoite keil vatinek, Ahi helah ruain keil ka heson keil iha en ahang keke henit lin keil.
Ka munak mikapil ral minau, ka mimusil kat selusien keil onak, kami mikilea mivahis ven asa emi vati, ka Ahi houmoni.
Ka navong mimai mivi meatin keil onak ka mison heite houlu en moulien onami, koanek mul vati lat isen Tata.
“Envatien onak mul en kami en vati sakien koa envatien onen Tata mul enau. Miheles miheapil vituai hetal minau keke envatien onak hel ven kami lisenges.

Munak milong kat mengkatien keil onak, mihetie lati keke mimul mikapil vituai ral minau anatin ka envatien onak hel ven kami. Koanek suval etin sakien koa inau nalong kat mengkatien keil onen Tata onak vatie lati keke namul nakapil vituai ral mini ka envatien onen mul enau.
“Naviten tounah keil enek min kami vasakin sien val en moulien onami vasuval sien koa mul enau. Ka ek vati keke mihehilelau en sien.
Mengkatien koa namul nasani min kami ekek: emi hehathat kami hesuval etin koa inau ek vat kami.
Sakien ten envatien koa marite mok keinek: navong meatin tai mul sa lat moulien onen vahinat tue keil. Sakien koanek marite mok en sakien sav keil ten envatien.
Ka kami mivi tuak keil munak mimumon asa koa nameng kat kami eni.

Narvisetei mun kami en meatin toumien keil onak, veni meatin toumien keil areingeingen asa koa masta one mul mumoni. Ka navise kami en tuak keil, veni navit meseini min kami tounah vasi koa Tata onak viteni minau.

Rovitei kami koa mirie lati keke mimusil inau, ka inau varei narie lat kami. Ka nasan umen min kami keke mivaha mivoum. Ka miheson heite hehi houlu, heite koa hel lisenges. Ka hesakini, Tata hesani min kami tounah koa mivisi en isok.
Avong tamun, mihoumon asa koa nameng kat kami eni: emi hehathat kami.”
Iesu mul sel kat meatin keil onen keke meatin keil ten out netan tine heat keil
Iesu vit risi min meatin keil onen vit, “Munak meatin keil ten out netan tine kat kami, mihendem kati keke, mulamu, tine kat inau.

Munak kami mivi meatin keil ten out netan, koakeil ten out netan e hehathat kami hesuval mivi one. Ka inau nalei kan kami miteisav ran koakeil ten out netan ka mirvitei mun ten out netan. Sakini, koakeil ten out netan tine kat kami.
Mihendem kat asa koa naviteni min kami keke slev tai romaritetei mok valin masta onen.
Sakini, koakeil amumoni tisa minau, miheilea keke umoni hetisa min kami emun. Ka koakeil along kat hihiseien keil onak, keil ilong kat hihiseien keil onami emun.
Keil koa umoni hetisa min kami umon tounah vasi enek min kami veni mivi onak keil ka mimum en isok. Ka umoni emun veni areingeingen kei koa sila inau numai.
Vahit marmaitei ka marvitentei min keil, keil avarmottei en tisaen. Ka veni numai anatin min keil ka asesein selusien onak, arie lati keke tisaen koanek mul en usite one.
Meatin koa tin kat inau, rie lati keke tin kat Tata onak emun.

Vahit marmaitei ka marmumontei merikel keil koa meatin sav keil asakras avoumoni, keil avarmottei en tisaen. Ka veni numai tuai ka namumon vati merikel keil en mete koa meatin sav keil asakras avoumoni, tisaen mul en usite one. Veni alei sesein merikel keil enek, arie lati keke tine kat inau ka Tata onak emun.
Koanik kur out vasakin selusien koa amutisi mul en mengkatien koa amusil kati keke vamai vahi anatin koa vit,
‘Tine kat heisav enau.’
Sam keil 69:4
“Navong Ninin ten kataunien hemai ven kami, kei hehit lein anatinien usil inau. Nisila heka ven Tata ka hehothot en anatinien onen min kami.
Ka kami mun mihehit lein inau min meatin sav keil, veni kami miro ral minau navong namum rohtoh mai rokol kosa.”
Iesu vit risi vit, “Naviten tounah keil ekek min kami keke minasavoitei en demkatien onami navong tounah keil hemai hekeih.
Iso lat kami ran eim tahihiseien one. Ka avong tai hemai koa meatin keil indemi ihit Ahi hesi kei imok navong u vini kami.
Ka keil umoni hemukonek veni areingeingeni keke navi isei, ka areingeingen Tata onak emun.
Ka naviten tounah keil enek min kami keke, navong hemai hehi anatin, mihendem kati keke navit luvati min kami tuai.”
Iesu vit luvati keke hesila Ninin Votut heha ven meatin keil onen
Iesu viteni min meatin keil onen vit, “Tounah keil ekek, narvitentei min kami mulamu, veni naro semau ral min kami.
Ka kosa niha ven kei koa sila inau numai. Mukos, tovuol en kami vahis inau keke niha en out kave.
Ka tinomi vilelau en demkoen ven tounah keil ekek koa naviteni min kami.
Avaseini, mal keke naviten anatinien koanek min kami: hetahos imok en usite onami keke inau niha. Veni munak nirvatei, Ninin ten kataunien hermaitei ven kami. Ka munak niha, nisila hemai ven kami.
Ka navong Ninin hemai, hetie lati min meatin keil keke rendemien one romaltei usil tisaen, maluen, ka mukave Ahi mul lei rahit usite onen meatin keil.
Ninin Votut hetie lat tisaen one min keil veni arkurtei anatin enau.
Hetie lat maluen onak min keil veni nihina ven Tata ka kami miherlestei mun inau.
Ka hetie lati vi anatin keke Ahi helei rahit usite one veni vit leini tuai mahien koa hesani min Temat, mari avat ten out netan.
“Ek vati mahit kilea tounah sav keil houlu min kami, ka kosa, hemeas ramat keke mivakuri.

Ka navong Ninin Votut koa mul vothot en anatinien hemai, kei hehisein kami en anatinien onen Ahi keke miheilea eni. Herselustei heka en rendemien onen sasen, ka hehit meseini min kami tounah vasi koa raengon Tata mul viteni, ka hehit luvat tounah keil koa hemai veah.
Kei hehati lat isok hemai hehi hetetamen imok, veni hekur tounah koa naviteni ka hehit meseini min kami.
Tounah vasi onen Tata onak vi onak emun. Sakini, nakilea mahiteni keke Ninin Votut hekur tounah koa naviteni mini, ka hehit meseini min kami.”
Iesu vit luvati keke longtisaen onen meatin keil onen hehiles hemai hehi sien
Iesu viteni mun min meatin keil onen vit, “Ten avong havivis, miherlestei mun inau. Ka, hevus, mihelei ris inau ten avong havivi emun.”

Tei en meatin onen keil avis keil eris avit, “?Asa varei aneite ten selusien onen koa vit, ‘Ten avong havivis, miherlestei mun inau. Ka, hevus, mihelei ris inau ten avong havivi emun’? ?Ka asa varei aneite ten, ‘Veni nihina ven Tata’?
?Ka, ‘Ten avong havivis’ vi asa? !Ir roreingeingen varein asa koa kei mul vit usili!”

Iesu kilea keke meatin keil onen e vati aval avahisi ven tounah keil enek. Sakini, viteni min keil vit, “Nakilea mimul mivit usil selusien onak navong navit, ‘Ten avong havivis, miherlestei mun inau. Ka, hevus, miheles ris inau ten avong havivi emun.’

Anatin eli naviteni min kami keke navong niha, kami miheis ka mihetang, ka meatin sav keil ten out netan isi keil hehi houlu. Anatin keke mihelonge hetisa hehi houlu, ka, hekatau, longtisaen onami hehiles hemai hehi sien.

Navong ahin tai vesesal vakur tivava ka rokol avong ten mahien onen, mul longe tisa veni. Ka, katau suk, navong kur tivava tuai mai en out netan, en vobongen mahien teni veni sien koa kuri houlu mok muli.
Koanek suval kami. Kosa milonge tisa. Ka navong nimai ris nilei ris kami, sien koa mihekuri hehi houlu mok. Ka meatin hetovuol heilea vakulat sien koanek vaha ran kami.
“Navong rehelei ris ir, kami mihervistei mun inau en etai hihiseien. Anatin eli naviteni min kami keke munak mivis Tata onak en etai tounah en isok, kei hesani min kami.
Rokol kosa, mirvistei veah etai tounah en isok. Munak mivis ven tounah, mihekuri. Ka navong mihekuri, mihehilelau vasi en sien.

“Navong naselus min kami usil tounah keil koa hemai hekistal, naselus suai eni en tatavolien keil. Ka avong tai hemai keke nirmultei mun niselus min kami en tatavolien keil. En avong enek, nihit kilea min kami usil Tata en selusien koa hemal enges.
En avong enek, kami mihehis Tata onak en isok ka hesani. Hervitei mun inau koa nihis mini en usite onami,
veni envatien onen Tata mul tuai en kami. Kei en vat kami veni envatien onami mul enau, ka mikur anatin keke inau naka veni.
Anatin varei keke naka ven Tata ka namita en out netan. Ka kosa, nilokovein out netan ka niha ris ven Tata.”
Ka meatin keil onen aviteni mini avit, “Anatin, kosa komul kovit lein tounah vasi. Korselus suaitei mun vatal tatavolien keil.

Kosa, komai mekilea keke kokilea tounah vasi. Ka mehervistei mun keik en tounah, veni kokilea asa koa mul en rendemien onomai tuai. Sakien enek mul sakin komai mekur anatin eni keke koka ven Ahi varei.”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “?Vi anatin keke mikur anatin enau suk?
Mihelong visi. Avong tai mul mai koa kami vasi mihetasil, ka tetai en kami heha ris en teim onen. Anatin keke miheling inau nito sasok. Ka avaseini, nirto sasoktei, veni Tata ro ral minau lisenges.
Naviten tounah keil ekek min kami keke miheapil vituai hetal minau, ka, hesakini, tomat hel en tinomi. Navong mimul en out netan ekek, mihehisu en sakvisien keil.
!Ka mihekeih, veni namu lin keihoen onen Temat tuai, koa vi avat ten out netan!”
Iesu vis Ahi keke hekataun kei ka meatin keil onen en avong takeih keil koa ihisu eni
Navong Iesu selus usil tounah keil ekek evus, seipat vina nesa ka vis vit, “O Tata, avong ten mahien mai tuai. Navisuk keke kihati lat isok, Natmali, keke inau nakilea mahati lat isom.
Koling moulien onen meatin vasi keil en hek keke nakilea masan moulien ten lisenges min koakeil vasi kosani minau.
Ka meatin hekur moulien ten lisenges navong kilea enuk koa keik kos kovi Ahi anatin, ka kilea enau mun koa navi Kristo koa kosani.
Inau navati lat isom en meten meatin keil ten out netan veni namum vasi umen koa kosani minau moumoni.
Sakini, Tata, navisuk keke kihati lat isok ka kisan hetetamenien minau hesuval koa nakuri tuai navong naro ral minuk en avong koa kormumontei veah out netan.
“Inau navothot enuk min koakeil kosan keil minau koa kolei kan keil ran meatin sav keil ten out netan. Keil avi onom, ka kosan keil minau. Keil along kat selusien onom.
Ka kosa, keil akilea keke tounah vasi kosani minau ka venuk.
Selusien koa kosani minau, inau nasani min keil, ka keil akur kati. Akilea vi anatin keke inau naka venuk, ka akur anatin keke kosan inau numai.
“Narvistei ven meatin vasi keil ten out netan. Ka namul navis keke kikataun koakeil kosani minau veni avi onom.
Koakeil vasi amusil kat inau avi meatin keil onom. Ka moulien one mul rie lat hetetamenien onak.

Namul nuvat venuk, ka nirtotei mun en out netan. Ka keil il semau ekok. O Tata, kovi votut vis kovi votut imok. Kiting koe moulien onen meatin keil onak hetal min keihoen ten isom, eis koa kosani minau. Hemukonek, keil imai itas hesuval koa keik ka inau lotas.

Navong naro semau ral min keil, naring koe keil ral min keihoen ten isom, eis koa kosani minau. Anatin, naring koe keil ka tovuol en keil vavuol. Tas lokovein inau ka va vuol, kei koa korie lati keke vavuol vasakin asa koa Tus Votut vit luvati vamai vahi anatin.
“Hervitei tuetin, nimai ris venuk. Ka, kosa, navong namul semau en out netan ekek, naviten tounah keil enek minuk vasakin meatin keil onak avalong kilea eni ka tine neim vahilelau en sien.

Nasan selusien onom min keil, ka sakini, meatin keil koa avi ten out netan, tine kat keil veni. Tine kat keil veni alei kilea keke onak keil arvitei ten out netan, suval koa inau mun narvitei ten out netan.
Tata, narvistei keik kovakulat keil ran out netan, ka navisuk eli kovating koe keil ran Temat koa vi vatte ten tisaen.
Meatin keil onak arvitei ten out netan, suval koa inau mun narvitei ten out netan.
Kiling seh en keil ihi votut keke usil kat selusien onom koa vi vatte ten anatinien.
Namul nasila keil uva avoum en out netan, suval koa keik kosila inau namita en out netan ekok.
Ka inau mun naling seh en moulien onak keke nihi votut musil asa koa ek vat inau moumoni. Namumoni vakataun keil vaka en anatinien onom keke avaling seh en moulien one venuk.
“Narvisteis ven meatin keil ekek, ka namul navis ven koakeil emun koa ikur anatin enau heka en selusien koa meatin keil onak isani min keil.

Tata, navis keke keil vasi imai itas. Anatin, iapil vituai hetal min ialu hesuval koa keik kokapil ral minau ka inau nakapil ral minuk. Veni, navong itas, meatin keil ten out netan ikur anatin keke keik varei kosila inau numai.
Vati hetetamenien koa kosani minau, inau nasani min keil. Hesakini, keil itas hesuval koa ialu lotas.
Inau niapil vituai hetal min keil hesuval koa ialu lokapil vituai. Hesakini, meatin keil ten out netan ilei kilea keke keik varei kosila inau namita ka envatien onom mul en keil suval koa mul enau.

“Tata, ek vati keke koakeil kosani minau akilea avato vatal minau en out nesa, ka avales hetetamenien onak. Anatin, ek vat keil iles hetetamenien koa kosani minau veni envatien onom mul tuai enau navong kormumontei veah out netan.
“Tata, keik komal imok. Avaseini meatin keil ten out netan areingeingenuk, inau ka koakeil kosani minau, komai mekileak.
Inau navothot enuk min keil, ka nil numoni. Hemukonek, envatien onom koa mul enau, hel en keil, ka inau mun nil en keil.”
Avuli kat Iesu
Navong Iesu vis evus, mea ral min meatin keil onen ka uva en usi Poal Kidron. En out enek, nei olip tai mul ien, ka uva ien.
Sudas kilea out kave uva ien veni, avong houlu, Iesu lah ruai ekonek ral min meatin keil onen. Sakini, navong Sudas va keke vamae lat Iesu vaha min hen vativieh keil onen,
mulamun vangi meatin tavaeen keil ten out Rom ral min meatin taleikokoeien keil ten Eim Votut koa asuv keil onen pris keil ka Farasi keil asila keil uva. Ka umai ral min laet ka ai tahuen keil one.
Iesu kilea tounah vasi koa hekistal mini, sakini va visu min keil ka vis keil vit, “?Kami mimul milekat isei?”
Avit kesi avit, “Iesu ten out Nasaret.”
Kei vit, “Inau navi kei.”
Sudas, koa mae lati eva en he mul mulomal ral min keil.
Navong Iesu vit, “Inau navi kei,”
keil asoretin keil ka umotmot uva en atan.
Iesu vis ris keil vit, “?Kami mimul milekat isei?”
Keil avit, “Iesu ten out Nasaret.”
Ka kei vit, “Naviteni min kami tuai keke inau navi kei.
Ka munak mimul milekat inau, mihemaen koakeil ekek iha.”
Kei viten selusien koanek vasakin asa koa kei viteni vamai vahi anatin navong vit, “Tata, tovuol en koakeil kosani minau vavuol.”
Evus, Saemon Pita, koa kur mari naef tai, leh lati ka musah koteh ralingen matu one slev onen asuv houlu onen pris keil. Isen slev enek vi Malkas.
Ka Iesu viteni keih min Pita vit, “!Ling ris naef onom en vulin! Mahien koanek, Tata onak varei sak meseini venau, ka mal imok keke nikur vasi.”
Evus, meatin tavaeen keil ten out Rom ral min avat one, ka meatin taleikokoeien keil ten Eim Votut umai avuli kat Iesu ka apar kati.
Mulamu, akuri va ven Annas, avu tisa onen Kaiafas, koa vi asuv houlu onen pris keil en sua koanek.
Ka vi Kaiafas varei koa vit, “Hetahos imok munak meatin hetas hemat en usite onen meatin keil, helin munak imaen me-Rom keil imai u vini me-Isrel vasi keil.”
Pita vit usite onen tovuol en Iesu

Saemon Pita ka meatin tamun onen Iesu lumul lulehni keilu lumusil Iesu. Ka veni asuv houlu onen pris keil kilea en meatin tamun enek, maeni musil Iesu va en teahu ten mari eim onen asuv houlu onen pris keil.

Ka Pita, kei mules mulomal hae vesesal en meteau. Sakini, meatin tamun koanek onen Iesu, koa asuv houlu onen pris keil kilea, kei va hae, selus min ahin koa lei kokoe en meteau. Sakini, amaen Pita emun va neim.
Navong ahin koa mul lei kokoe en meteau les Pita, viteni mini vit, “Ei, keik emun kovi tai en meatin keil onen meatin ekek.”
Pita vit kesi vit, “Vuo, rovitei inau.”

Out mandil houlu. Sakini, meatin taleikokoeien keil ka meatin toumien keil onen asuv houlu onen pris keil amumon ahang en sakol, ka amulomal rahiti amul amutae. Ka Pita emun mul mulomal ral min keil ka mul mutae ahang.
Asuv houlu onen pris keil Annas vis Iesu usil hihiseien keil onen
En out neim, Iesu mulomal en meten asuv houlu onen pris keil koa visi usil meatin keil onen ka hihiseien keil onen.

Iesu vit kesi vit, “Tounah koa naselus usili, navit leini min meatin vasi keil. Navong navihisei, namumoni en eim tahihiseien keil orer ka en teahu ten Eim Votut, out keil koa Siu keil alah ruai ien. Narvit suain etai tounah.
?Vensa varei mimul mivis inau usili? Alhis koakeil araengon asa naviteni min keil, veni keil along kilea asa naviteni.”
Navong Iesu viteni mukok, meatin taleikokoeien tai onen asuv houlu onen pris keil kovas veinan Iesu ka vit, “?!Vensa varei komul koselus mukonek min asuv houlu onen pris keil!?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “Munak naviten etai tounah tisa, kihit leini vi asa. ?Ka munak asa naviteni mal, vensa varei kokovas inau?”
Evus, Annas san Iesu koa rop mul veah en hen keilu va ven Kaiafas, asuv houlu onen pris keil.
Pita vit usite onen tovuol en Iesu avong tamun
Navong Pita mul veah mulomal vesesal en ahang ka mul mutae, tei en meatin keil avisi avit, “?Mukave? ?Keik emun kovi tai en meatin keil onen meatin keisom?”
Ka Pita muun vit, “Vuo, rovitei inau.”
Evus, slev tai onen asuv houlu onen pris keil, koa mul en vatiamal onen slev koa Pita ra koteh ralingen, viteni vit, “?Ka rovitei keik koa nalesuk en nei olip ral mini?”
Hatte etel eni, Pita muun vit, “Vuo, rovitei inau.” Ka en hati avong enek, ato kokorat.
Akur Iesu va en meten Paelet

En visokon semau, akulat Iesu ran teim onen Kaiafas, asuv houlu onen pris keil, ka amulamuni va en teim onen Paelet, avat ten kavmen en out enek. Ka hetetamen onen Siu keil arvatei en teim onen veni kei rovitei Siu tai ka e rovattei avamai avahilehilu en meten Ahi. Veni, hemukonek, asakras avaan Anien ten Mul Laui.
Sakini, Paelet va hae keke vales keil. Navong les keil, vis keil vit, “?Tisaen sa varei koa mivit meatin ekek mumoni va kat kami?”
Avit kesi avit, “Meatin koanek vi meatin tisa tai. Vahit varvitei anatin mevarsantei minuk keke kovasan mahien mini.”
Paelet viteni min keil vit, “Mukonek, kami varei mihekuri ka mihelei rahit usite onen. Hevus, mihesan mahien mini housil mengkatien keil onami.”
Ka avit kesi avit, “Mengkatien keil ten kantri koanik ring koe komai vit komai Siu keil mesakras mevasan matien min etai meatin en kot onomai.”
Koanek kur out vasakin selusien onen Iesu vamai vahi anatin navong vit luvat vati sakien sa koa hemat eni.
Sakini, Paelet va ris teim onen ka visi avalamun Iesu vamai en meten. Navong lesi, Paelet visi vit, “?Mukave? ?Anatin keke keik kovi asuv houlu onen Siu keil?”
Iesu vit kesi vit, “?Komul kovis inau mukok en usite onom sasom, vuo veni meatin sav keil avit usil inau minuk?”
Paelet vit kesi vit, “Usite onak tovuol enuk veni inau narvitei Siu tai. Vi meatin keil kati onom ka asuv keil onen pris keil koa amae latuk komai en hek. ?Vensa? ?Komumon sa koa tisa en keil?”

Iesu viteni mini vit, “Hiasuvien onak keke mahi asuv houlu rokatei ran out netan. Veni munak vi anatin keke hiasuvien onak ka ran tounah en out netan ekek, meatin keil onak ivae en usite onak keke hesakini nirvatei en hen hetetamen keil onen Siu keil. Sakini, kolesi keke hiasuvien onak rokatei ran out ekok.”
Paelet visi vit, “?Sakini, anatin keke kovi asuv houlu?”
